inn1.comm: good length outside off stump, sits up and Sehwag gets up on his toes to defend
a low full toss outside off stump and Sehwag just squeezes that smack between cover and point and thats four
too straight this time and Sehwag flicks across the stumps and picks the gap at square leg this time, closes the bat face with good control
straight again this time he turns it to the man at short midwicket, who's left his spot at second slip
slow and wide, Sehwag just reaches out and picks that same gap between cover and point for another freebie
short of a length and he very nearly inside-edges back onto off stump as he gets up and plays outside the line
good length angled across off stump, and he inside-edges it to leg
good length on off stump and its driven back to Morne in his followthrough
tad fuller this time outside off stump, Jayasuriya just pushes it to point
well bowled, a nice yorker-length delivery on off stump and Jayasuriya does well to just dig that out
good stuff again, pitching it on a length just outside off stump and getting it to swing away even as the batsman decides to leave it alone
overpitched outside off stump but all he can do it drive to short extra cover
super straight drive to a full delivery but it ricochets into the stumps and sneaks towards mid-off, they run hard and pick up two
whoah Nelly! Albie bounces one fairly wide of off stump, it sits up and Sehwag does his very best to reach it but cant
this time its a wide down leg side as he pitches fuller and with a runaway radar
good length delivery comes in from outside off stump, Sehwag just gets half-cock forward and defends to the on side
full on off stump, Sehwag drives straight to mid-on
too full and too straight, Sehwag flicks across his stumps, in the air, down to the man at fine leg
full, not too wide, slammed in the air over the man at cover, easy as they come
shorter this time, he oversteps, Jayasuriya cant time his cut properly and finds point
good length outside off stump and its just defended to point
short and wide, Sehwag cant reach it and a wide is called
back of a length outside off stump, he gets forward and pushes into the covers where Sibanda does well to dive and cut off runs
full outside off stump and its driven with good use of the feet to mid-off
okay then, Jayasuriya sees a full and wide delivery and easily scoops that over backward point for four
short of a length on off stump, he shuffles and works it to square leg
short and wide, he stands up and eases that down to third man
overpitched outside off stump, he drives well but thats very neatly intercepted by short extra cover
full and straight, Sehwag flicks past square leg, top shot
good length outside off stump and Sehwag greets it with a lazy push into the covers and scampers down the track, Sibanda runs from mid-off and collects it
short of a length outside off stump and Jayasuriya watches it into Boucher's gloves
good length outside off stump and its driven out to the man at deep cover and a poor collection from Boucher allows the batsmen to pick up another
and thats a tame way to get out, as he just drives a good length delivery straight into the hands of Dippneaar mid-off, not timed well and he picked the man who didnt have to move an inch
good length and he just defends it back to the bowler
good length outside off stump and thats nothing but a push back past the bowler's left hand and mid-off cant cut it off, sweet timing on that shot
back of a length outside off stump, steers it to backward point
short of a length and nipping in, he stands tall and defends it back to the bowler

overpitched, Sehwag drives firmly just wide of Ongondo at mid-off, Sehwag is more than halfway down the track for the easiest of singles, but Ganguly is ball watching, thats poor stuff from him, alls well that ends well in the end
short of a length outside off stump, left alone
good length outside off stump, driven into the covers
back of a length outside off stump, just pushed into the covers for one
back of a length outside off stump, he defends to point
short of a length this time and he cuts wide of the body but cant beat backward point this time
straight on the stumps and now he turns it right to the man at midwicket
back of a length outside off stump, pushed to cover...crowd dull now
short of a length, and he drives to short extra cover to end a very good over from Odoyo
good ball on the stumps and he drops the head to defend to the off
good length again, sitting up a tad more, he gets behind the line and defends it to Morne
good stuff again, no room to cut or flick so he gets forward and defends it
back of a length again, really straight wicket-to-wicket stuff, and Sehwag plonks forward to defend as Morne appeals optimistically
he goes astray a tad, offering Sehwag some width and he waits, gets up, and slaps that in the gap behind point for four
straighter this time, Sehwag drives it to Ongondo at mid-on and harries one to keep strike
short and wide, he cuts hard but an athletic de Villiers cuts it off at backward point
slower and fuller, moves in a fraction but Sehwag gets over it and steers it to point
pitches full and moves away as Ganguly judges it well and shoulders arms, Test-match style
slow on a length, Ganguly uses the soft hands to tap it straight to point
back of a length, he gets up and drops the hands to run one in front of point, get off the mark and raise the Asian 50 in good time
straight on off stump, he uneasily turns it to mid-on and scampers a single
awesome stuff from Sehwag, who uses the feet to greet a good length ball and slam it through extra cover for four
overpitched wide of off stump, Sehwag gets down on bended knee and drives that over the covers for four more
straighter this time, Sehwag gets belligerent and heaves it down the ground but Kemp fields down at mid-off
slower ball, back of a length, Sehwag adjusts and eases that out to the man at deep cover
edged and it falls short of Boucher! Another slower delivery from Chigumbura, pitching on a length outside off stump and seaming away, Ganguly defends it and is lucky it didnt carry
but there's nothing wrong with that shot as Ganguly effortlessly drives one between cover and mid-off to make it 17 from the over

dropped! There were three men on the ring, backward point, deep gulley and short third man for this very shot, but Sehwag gets a life as Ongondo dives to his left and cant hold on to Sehwag's uppercut at the second of those three positions
back of a length outside off stump, pushed into the covers for one
back of a length, streakily steered to Ongondo at gulley again
straighter on the stumps, worked to square leg for one more
just a little bit slower on and around off stump, Ganguly pushes it to point
back of a length, again its just pushed to point
length ball outside off stump, he gets the feet tangled up and heaves across the line, impetous stroke to midwicket, needless too
well hit, as Sehwag stands and clouts a straight delivery over wide long-on to raise his 50, rapid innings and he'll be glad to get there

and what's he done next ball? He loosely, and I'm talking somewhat one-handedly, gets over-confident and lofts a well-disguised slower ball straight into the hands of long-on, who doesnt have to move much from his position well inside the ropes
overpitched outside off stump, he gets to it and drives out to the man in the deep
good length this time, driven to short cover
back of a length, he pushes to the left of point but thats some excellent work there to deny him an easy single
back of a length, coming in from outside off stump and Dhoni defends
identical delivery and Dhoni hurries to defend to the off side
slower one goes wrong, ending up too full and wide and umpire Parker spreads his arms
good length outside off stump, Dhoni pushes past mid-off and forces Ganguly to run hard for the second, good to see the enthusiasm
short  of a length, he whips that to a diving Botha in the covers, moving quickly, diving, and saving a run
back of a length, instead of cutting square he somehow drives that to cover
in the zone to be driven, and he does so, on the up, to collect his first boundary
good length outside off stump, he drops the hands and picks up an easy single before point and cover converge
comes down the track, Chigumbura adjusts to drop short, but Dhoni still manages to slam that over cover for four
slower ball, a bit fuller and Dhoni eases that into the covers
back of a length on off stump and Ganguly is almost squared up as he tries to manufacture a run to leg
again he walks across the stumps, eyeing the on side, but he misses out on a slower ball and takes it on the pads well outside off stump
good length outside off stump, pushed straight to cover
good length outside off stump, no room on offer, Dhoni drives to Botha at point
back of a length, chopped into the covers
fuller this time, punched hard down the ground, Morne gets a hand to it and fires it back at Dhoni
Short and wide, cut to Odoyo in the deep
full and pushed to cover for a single
full again and pushed to cover again but Dippenaar cuts it off
back of a length, driven to mid off
length-delivery, driven to extra cover

shout for lbw. It was a loopy delivery, that drifted in from round the stumps and hit him on the left boot as Ganguly pushed forward in defence. It was struck on the leg and middle line and might have missed the leg stump. Close.
on the leg and middle, pushed forward defensively
again on the leg and middle line, Ganguly leans forward, head over the ball and defends.
tossed-up, on the middle line, driven back to the bowler. That was a very good first over on the return to international cricket.
full-pitched, on the middle line, driven with a powerful bottom-hand grip, towards mid off
length-delivery on the off stump line, Dhoni just leans forward, not much foot movement, punches it out to cover
on a length, nagging line around the off stump and Dhoni has to be contend defending it to the off side
short of length, it climbs up almost chest-high, outside the off stump, Dhoni hops up, gets the bat horizontal, keeps it down towards point
short of length, outside the off stump, Dhoni leans back, punches it to sweeper cover
from round the stumps, full and on the leg and middle, tucked away to deep square leg
tossed up on a length, Ganguly tamely steers it to point
flatter one, he comes out and looks to biff that over mid-on, but makes a hash of it, hitting into the ground at midwicket
uses the feet, Botha sees him and fires it full on leg stump, and he flicks to midwicket
he breaks the shackles with a good hit back over Botha's head, using the feet well at last and teeing off
full and flat on middle stump, he gets over it and defends it back
flat on off stump, he gets forward and taps it to cover
good length outside off stump, driven to mid-off
good, straight ball on the stumps is pushed back to the bowler
this is what he should be doing! Makes room to leg and frees the arms, slamming a short delivery over mid-off for four
good length on off stump, pushed to mid-off off the back foot
back of a length, he stands up and punches it straight down the ground and long-off does the fielding
good length outside off stump and Dhoni has to reach across and drive to cover
short of a length, Ganguly cuts to backward point
tossed up on leg stump, he shuffles and turns it down to fine leg
spins down leg stump for a wide as Boucher fumbles the collection
leg stump again and Ganguly nudges to square leg
full and fast outside leg stump, Dhoni paddles it straight to short fine leg
thinks about coming out and hitting over the top but Botha adjusts the line and Dhoni defends to leg
full and flat this time and Dhoni drives out to long-on on for one
back of a length outside off stump, he hits it too hard into the covers
short and wide, he flat-bats that to a diving Kemp at cover
good length outside off stump, driven straight to Pollock at mid-off
fraction wide, he cuts it in the air down towards third man
slower ball, full and honing in on leg stump, nudged to mid-on
full ball on off stump, pushed to mid-off as he comes forward
flat and fired down leg stump, Dhoni  plays some sort of standing paddle shot but cant beat short fine leg
so he says stuff this, steps down the track and clouts a flat delivery up onto the roof above long-on, thats a massive six really
he's wary of Dhoni charging out, so fires one full way down leg stump for a wide
he has scant respect for Botha this over, coming dancing down and hitting one very flat down the ground and it thuds into the sight screen, what power!
shorter ball outside off stump and thats hit very hard to Botha's left, into the ground
flat again on middle and leg, Dhoni comes out but cant time it at all, hits to midwicket instead
tossed up gently on off stump and Ganguly comes forward and defends, much to Botha's pleasure
short of a length and thats an odd shot to cover off one leg
back of a length outside off stump, Ganguly uses the feet and drives straight to mid-off
back of a length and coming into him, he tries to work it to leg but hits it too hard
back of a length again and this time he hits it back to Chigumbura in his followthrough
angles into him this time and he presents the full face of the bat back to the bowler
fraction room and he drives very hard to the man at cover, who does well to stop that rocket of a shot
full outside off stump, the bat face turns in Ganguly's hands and he taps it back to Morkel
full again, this time he gets down and drives to mid-off for an easy single
cleaned 'em up! Full in the blockhole, Dhoni shapes up to twirl one through the leg side but the ball shoots under the bat and disturbs the furniture and Albie celebrates his strike
drifts down leg stump and Jayawardene helps it on the way down to Morne at fine leg
slower ball, fuller too and Ganguly defends down the track
full on off stump, driven back to Albie to end off a good over
back of a length on the stumps and Jayawardene defends back to Odoyo
doesnt waste time, making use of Kemp's decision and lifts the slower ball back over the stumps to long-on for four
moves well down leg stump, he looks to paddle but it bobs up off the outside of the leg to the on side and Boucher fields
back of a length outside off stump and the extra lift surprises him as he drives streakily to mid-off
full and wide, he goes for the cut, cant reach the ball and Parker signals wide
dropped in short on the stumps, he's into his swivel in a flash, pulling very well over midwicket for half a dozen
slower and fuller, but on leg stump, he turns it past square leg, comes back for the second, and a wayward throw from Sibanda in the deep gives up four, poor stuff from him
full and wide down leg stump, he flicks and misses, Boucher does well to stop it
good length on off stump, Jayawardene thinks about turning it to leg but stops the shot as the ball sits up
back of a length on off stump, now he shuffles across in an attempt to pick up one to leg but is again undone by the carry
again he shuffles across and cant make use of his attempted work to leg
now Albie serves up a half-volley outside off stump and Jayawardene square-drives in the small opening between cover and point
close! Slower ball on leg stump, he bends down and sweeps, the ball rolls off his forearm and lands very close to leg stump
back of a length, worked to midwicket
angled down leg stump, Jayawardene's caught on the leg as he goes for the flick and Morne lets out a half-appeal
back of a length on off stump, he gets behind the line and defends

dropped but a super effort from Dippeaar at mid-on! Jayawardene makes room to leg and hits one with one-hand, ala Sehwag, down towards the man at the 30-yard-circle, who leaps back in the air, gets his right hand to it, bobs it back up but cant take it on the second attempt!
woof! Fraction short, he clears the front leg and slams that through backward point and all the fielders can do is look on in amazement
good length outside off stump, he pushes it to mid-off smartly to get his captain back on strike
short-pitched delivery outside off stump, up he gets, uppercutting over the vacant slip region down to third man on the bounce
lands outside off stump on a length and Jayawardene gets down to swivel it past a diving Morne at short fine leg, cheeky shot
more runs, as he just gets forward and times a lovely push through the covers, sweetness personified
back of a length on middle and off, he turns it to leg
back of a length outside off stump and he opens the face to run it to Chigumbura at backward point
slower and fuller outside off stump, he gets to the pitch and loosely drives in the gap at covers out to Odoyo at sweeper position
length ball on the stumps and he pushes it back past the bowler's outstretched left hand and picks up a single
good length on the stumps, worked to midwicket for one
back of a length outside off stump, defended to point off the back foot
good length again, square-driven to backward point this time
full on middle and off and Jayawardene flicks over square leg for one
short outside off stump, he reaches out and opens the face of the bat, running it down to third man for one more
straight and full on off stump, on-driven to mid-on for a quick single
good length on off stump, he rolls the wrists and picks up a couple past midwicket
slower ball, full and wide, he kneels down and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
width on offer and he too steers it to third man, but for a brace
good length, pushed to mid-off
on middle and leg stump, he nudges it to the leg side for one
straighter ball on the stumps and Jayawardene on-drives down the ground to keep strike
tossed up on off stump, turned square to short fine leg
lands on middle and leg and spins down some, Boucher tries to take the bails off but fumbles
tossed up down leg stump, Jayawardene gets down to sweep, misses, and an optimistic appeal from just Botha is turned down
lands on leg stump and spins down, Ganguly thinks it should be called wide
gives it some good flight, Ganguly gets forward and taps it to the off side, some yes, no, yes, no
tossed up down leg stump and Ganguly works that to square leg for one, leg bye comes the signal from the umpire...odd...looked like bat to me
tossed up on leg stump, fails to work it away
quicker one on middle and leg, Ganguly pushes back to Sibanda, who's not getting any spin
flatter and fuller on leg stump, Jayawardene on-drives for one
short, wide, and Ganguly spanks that through the off side out to Odoyo in the deep
there's his 7,000th ODI run as he drives a full delivery into the covers for one, and he's the 23rd overall and 5th Sri Lankan
tossed up and he comes forward to defend
tossed up outside leg stump, he looks to paddle but thats off the pad
shot, as he comes out and collects one on the full to drill it over the bowler for four
spins away outside leg stump, Ganguly tries to nudge it to leg, the ball runs to short fine leg and umpire Parker signals leg-byes, so he stays on 49
on leg stump again and Jayawardene flicks out to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, Ganguly drives straight to mid-off
tossed up on off stump and Ganguly gets tangled up as he tries to just nudge that away for one, the ball getting caught beween his feet off the inside-edge
too far outside off stump and wide is the call
full and flat on off stump, he shuffles and drives to mid-on
now he gets to 50 with an easy push through the covers and the Chennai crowd cheer their appreciation
tossed up outside off stump, driven out to the deep for one
flatter on middle and leg, he uses the feet well and drives, inside-out, through the covers for another single
short on the stumps, he gets into position and pulls through midwicket
flat on leg stump, he makes room and drives through the covers for one more and will retain strike
straighter ball on a length, Ganguly waits for it and opens the face to pick up one just wide of point
full and flat, he comes forward and takes it on the full to whip one past mid-on
tossed up, Ganguly backs away to leg, comes out, and easily chips over cover for four, good use of the feet
flatter ball on leg stump but Ganguly drives into the covers for an easy single
tossed up on off stump and Jayawardene comes forward and defends
fuller ball on off stump, this time he plays across the line but cant beat midwicket
full ball on leg stump, flicked to midwicket

oh Ganguly, Ganguly, Ganguly, who's been involved in 51 run outs, taps one to the off side, shuffles a few steps, sees Jayawardene harry down the pitch and then sends him back to his fate, and he's not even in the frame as a good throw comes in and Sibanda whips off the bails...poor call for a run
tossed up, he uses the feet and drives hard to mid-off
leg stump line, worked straight to midwicket
quicker one outside off stump, driven into the covers
tossed up, he pushes that to cover to end a maiden over
tossed up, pitches and goes the other way, Yousuf pushes and misses it, Botha lets out an elongated appeal but Parker is mute
tossed up wider and this time he square-drives out towards third man
tossed up outside off stump, he tries the reverse-sweep but misses
flatter on off stump, Yousuf drives back to Botha
slower ball outside off stump, he looks to work across the stumps but fails
he oversteps this time, Yousuf defends to point
low full toss on leg stump which he on-drives to mid-on for one
spins in from the rough and he makes room, cutting out to deep backward point
tossed up, he uses the feet and square-drives for one
tossed up on off stump and Yousuf works it to midwicket
spins down leg stump, down he gets in an attempt to sweep but its called wide
tossed up, he gets two steps in and chips it over mid-off
full and flat outside off stump, Ganguly reaches for it and chops in front of short third man
comes out and tries to belt the cover off the ball, but ends up hitting into the ground and the ball bobs back into him
back of a length on the stumps, he stands up and punches back down the ground to Chigumbura
makes room for himself and hits a short delivery to deep backward point
short and wide, Yousuf square-drives out to the man covering the boundary ropes
slower and fuller, Ganguly meets it with a lazy off-drive and picks up one more
nice shot from Yousuf, getting up on the toes and back-cutting one nicely behind square and it beats third man by some distance
now he overcompensates with a fuller delivery down leg, which Yousuf deftly helps on its way around the corner to the fine leg ropes
he comes out, bowler sees him and fires it flat and wide of off stump
flat again, this time Ganguly drives to de Villiers at short cover
spins away from the rough and he late-cuts out to deep backward point where Odoyo covers good ground from sweeper and saves runs
full toss on leg stump and he fails to cash in, only working one to short fine leg
innocuous full toss on off stump, which Yousuf nicely slams over long-off, easy as  they come
tossed up outside off stump and he steers it to short third man for one
tossed up outside off stump and Ganguly comes out and inside-out drives that for one
short of a length outside leg stump, easy pickings for Ganguly to nudge that off the hips to fine leg
comes out and drives a full delivery over cover-point for two
short of a length outside off stump, Yousuf brings up the 250 with a simple steer to third man
dropped! Ganguly walks across his stumps and paddles a harmlessly slow delivery to Ongondo at short fine leg, who jumps up and lets it through his palms
good length on the stumps, pushed to midwicket

oh ho! Yousuf too ambles across his stumps and connects much better than Ganguly, simply hoisting one off the pads for six over deep midwicket, was up in the air for a while but safely cleared the man out there
now he makes room and slams one over extra cover, super shot
backs away to leg, bowler fires it wide of off stump and Ganguly has to reach out and tap it into the covers
slower ball outside off stump which he drives back to Sibanda
tossed up, driven back towards the bowler, who dives and fields
tossed up, he comes out and slams that over mid-on
spins down leg stump, he gets down and tries to sweep but misses
short and wide, he chops that to backward point
he comes out, bowler sees it and fires it flat down leg, Yousuf has to defend
tossed up outside off stump and this time Yousuf goes for a reverse-sweep and makes a mess of it
full and wide down leg stump
flat on leg stump, he uses the feet and drives out to deep midwicket
spins in from off stump, Ganguly exposes all the stumps and late cuts to backward point, where Sibanda stops it
tossed up, stays straight as Ganguly again makes room to cut but ends up pushing to cover for a quick single
back of a length outside off stump, he swipes across the line and picks up one out to midwicket where Kemp dives and saves runs, great effort
just walks across the stumps and flicks over midwicket for a couple
lovely shot, just getting down and driving a half-volley over cover for four
fuller and straighter, now Yousuf shuffles across and flicks nicely down to Botha at fine leg
walks into this one and clouts it through midwicket and this time Ganguly hustles and calls for the second, well run and Yousuf applauds his Indian partner
full toss above the hips, he manages to chop it towards backward point and signals to the umpire that it was a no-ball, but he's ignored
short and wide, he cuts hard but cant beat the off side
flatter and down leg stump, Yousuf works it around the corner for one
comes out, the ball is fired in flat on leg stump, Ganguly heaves at it and gets an inside-edge down to fine leg
quicker one goes down leg and Ganguly has to push back to Botha, well bowled
tough chance goes down as he makes room to cut, Botha chases him, and the thin under-edge is put down by Boucher
middle and leg line again, this time he shuffles and works it fine
slow and full outside off stump and he square-drives over point out to the man on the ropes, on the bounce, of course
full toss outside off stump, he makes room and flays the bat it it, getting a nick on it but it falls wel short of Boucher, so not a chance at all
slower ball, good length on off stump, Ganguly makes room and cuts into the covers
shuffles across, Odoyo fires it full down leg stump, Yousuf misses and a wide is called though there was some noise...
back of a length outside off stump, stays low but Yousuf adjusts to drop the hands on that one and run it to third man
awesome shot! Ganguly eases into a fine lofted drive straight down the ground, reminiscent of the days of old, and picks up half a dozen!
slower ball outside leg stump, he just taps it to square leg and keeps hold of the scoring

and he perishes, standing in his crease and swinging a full toss below the waist across the line and it spirals up in the air for Ongondo to hold onto a good catch running in from deep square leg, so there's no hundred for Ganguly, but he hung around and dug in for a fighting 88
full on off stump, he again walks into the shot and flicks across the line for one out to deep midwicket
slower ball outside off stump, Yuvraj opens his account with a flicked scoop over mid-on for two
full toss outside off stump, he flays the bat at it and doesnt manage to put it away
another chest-high full toss well outside off stump, no-ball called, which he thick-edges down to third man for four
slower ball, good fuller length and no room to hit, Yousuf comes forward and then taps it to point
full outside off stump, pitches and swings away from Yousuf's bat as drives on one knee
full toss on leg stump which he clips to de Villiers at midwicket for the single
full delivery outside off stump as Morkel sees Yuvraj backing away, and the result is a valuable dot ball
another full delivery, slower, which Yuvraj just manages to get bat on to get one past backward point
well bowled, in the blockhole and its dug out to point for a quick single
strives for a yorker, ends up a low, low full toss which Yuvraj nonchalantly scoops back, no follow-through and punch et al, smack back down the ground for six, sweetly timed
slower ball on off stump, he drives and inside-edges to leg and raises his second 50 of the tournament, well played, in great time too
full toss on off stump, and he swivels it across the line and a diving Pollock at deep backward square leg cant cut it off
too far down leg stump as Yuvraj shuffles across and wide is called
clean, flat strike as he bends down on one knee and smokes that over mid-on for six more, making full use of the batting opportunity is Yuvraj
good comeback! The response from the youngster is a well-directed bouncer past the batsman's nose, very close to taking his head off
overpitched outside off stump and he drives out to deep extra cover
slower ball outside off stump, Yousuf opens the face and runs it to third man for one
edged and gone! Yousuf sees the half-volley, gets onto bended knee and square-drives the legcutter but the result is a simple outside edge into Boucher's gloves
great lifter outside off stump, he gets up on the toes and chases it only to get beaten by the extra bounce
fuller, he pushes to mid-off, de Villers dives, picks and throws to the stumps, the batsman's not in the frame but umpire Hill intercepts the throw...thats really unlucky for the fielder
good length on the stumps, flicked to midwicket for one

and he goes, standing and slashing one up into the air, and thats an excellent catch from de Villiers, who covers a huge amount of distance running back from cover, keeping his eyes on the ball as it dies against the starry night, and pouching it in front of him! Morne applauds his fielder, and rightfully so
and he ends the innings by serving up a full toss that Yuvraj cuts over gully for four, and Asia have set Africa 338 for victory

inn2.comm: straight ball on off stump, de Villiers pushes down the ground and mid-on moves around to cut off the ball
straight ball, Sibanda covers it and flicks off the pads for three down to Zaheer at fine leg
driveable length outside off stump, and he does so, just punching into the ground and getting it to bounce over the man at cover
back of a length on off stump, defended to the off side
good length, nothing wrong with that ball but Sibanda's timing is such that he executes a perfect off drive for four, lovely to see
good length outside off stump and he drops the hands on it, running it to Yurvaj at backward point
back of a length outside off stump, he nudges it off the pads down to fine leg and calls for two, chancing Rafique's arm and making it in time
back of a length on off stump, he gets behind the line and defends to the on side
angles one across his stumps this time and he judges it to leave it be
back of a length once more but this time de Villiers gets over it in defense
strays to leg stump and its angled down to fine leg, bit of pad and bat on that one
length ball on leg stump, de Villiers nudges it to mid-on and sets off for a quick run
wonderfull biff! de Villiers gives Asif the charge, not timing it to perfection, but picking the gap over extra cover for four

edged and what a superb take from Dhoni, diving full length to his right and holding it an inch off the ground to send de Villiers back to the hut, and again Asif has his man, pitching one on middle stump and deviating it off the seam to flummox the batsman, classical pace bowler's dismissal
nice way to get off the mark, getting behind the line and on-driving a full delivery back down the ground
too full on leg stump from Asif and Dippenaar caresses the flick through midwicket for four more
short of a length on the stumps, he shuffles well and works that into the gap at square leg for two this time
short of a length outside off stump, pushed off the back foot to cover to end an expensive but successful over from Asif
lifter over off stump, Sibanda shapes to pull but gets beaten by the bounce and Dhoni appeals after collecting
regular outside leg-stump line, Sibanda cant time his shuffle and nudge off the pads the way he'd have liked
another length ball outside leg stump and now he manages to work one to short fine leg
good length outside off stump, Dippenaar gets forward and times the push nicely but Jayawardene jumps up and intercepts at short cover
short ball on middle and leg stump, he pulls but mistimes it poorly to square leg
a little slower this one, back of a length on off stump, and he gets behind the line and defends back to Zak
dragged in short outside off stump, Sibanda pulls with little conviction and luckily places it high in the air over midwicket
good length outside off stump, he lunges forward and steers it to backward point
back of a length outside off stump and he shoulders arms confidently
back of a length once more but this time Sibanda punches a good-looking shot off the back foot to the man at cover
another ball outside off stump and Sibanda takes the bottom hand off the bat as he drives off the back foot and the ball rolls to leg
fraction shorter outside off stump and he swivels into pulling position, picking up two through square leg
back of a length angled past off stump, stands in his crease and pushes to point
back of a length wider of off stump and now he mistimes his drive, chopping into the ground for Zaheer to collect
slower ball drifts to leg stump, Dippenaar flicks and picks up two as he sees Rafique give chase from long leg
back of a length, straight delivery and he executes a fine drive back onto the stumps and the ball carries on the ground
poor start, wide down leg stump and the batsmen steal one more as Dhoni fumbles
slow medium stuff on leg stump, worked to midwicket
good length outside off stump, driven to mid-off to close the over
slower, fuller, and Sibanda drives to mid-off
back of a length outside off stump, opens the face and square-drives to backward point
much wider this time and Sibanda chases it to get beaten
short of a length outside off stump and he keeps it down to backward point as he defends
back of a length outside off stump and he leaves it be
shorter ball outside off stump, he stands up and chases it, intentionally steering it through the vacant slip region for four
rubbish delivery, way down leg stump, interesting move to keep bowling
fuller on off stump, he drives streakily across the line past mid-on, shouts of catch it but there was nobody there
straighter one, he flicks through square leg and runs hard
back of a length on leg stump, he gets pack and punches in the gap at midwicket and Rafique has work to do out in the deep as the 50 comes up
too straight again on the stumps, Dippennar on-drives to long-on
strays down leg stump, Sibanda works it off the pads and Mortaza, the sub, dives and gets a hand to it at short fine leg, good fielding to save the second
leg stump again and its driven to midwicket
short outside off stump, Sibanda pulls and the ball slams into his shoulder before rolling to Dhoni, who dives and does well to stop it
good length on off stump and he drives to mid-on
short and wide and he crunches that off the back foot to point
short and wide again, he rocks back and cuts fiercely into the covers and Jayasuriya throws himself to his left and cuts it off, brilliant
short again but Sibanda cant beat cover with a hard cut shot
back of a length, he stands and drives with an inside-edge back onto the leg
wide down leg stump, he looks to flick and misses out
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and punches to cover
overpitched and Dippenaar take full toll, driving with great timing through the covers
back of a length outside off stump, gets up and drives to the man at cover
more leg side line this time and he turns that in the air past square leg for one
once more its leg stump and Sibanda works it off the pads out to Rafique
fuller on off stump, he flicks to midwicket
full ball outside off stump, batsman just manages to dig that out
overpitches and Sibanda firmly drives through the covers, lovely placement and timing on that shot
shorter but down leg stump and now he tucks it around the corner for a brace to raise the 50-run stand
straighter on the stumps and he flicks hard but straight to midwicket
slower and fuller and Sibanda gets beaten on the drive, the balls in the air but dies before Sehwag at cover, who dives but doesnt get to it
yorker on leg stump, and Sibanda just manages to get bat on it, pacy delivery from a charged-up Fernando
short of a length on off stump and he gets up on the toes to work one past square leg
short outside off stump, Sibanda hurries to cut but his steer doesnt beat backward point
walks down the track and ambitiously swings at a well-disguised slower ball, and connects with air
fraction short, he rocks into position and pulls just past a diving Sehwag at short midwicket, calls of catch it but thats four
good length outside off stump and he steers that to point off the front foot
comes out of the crease, cashes in on the length and creams that up and over point and the outfield takes care of the rest, Sibanda flourishing now
short of a length on off stump, Dippenaar is forced up on the toes to defend it down
brilliant yorker on leg stump, expertly dug out by Dippenaar and he responds well to Sibanda's call as the balls rolls to short fine leg
ripper! A really fast bouncer lands outside leg stump and screaches past Sibanda, who's forced to really arch his back and he falls down as that nearly knocks his block off

the set-up works, as Sibanda gets tangled up pulling one thats not quite there for that shot, he's very late on the shot and the ball takes the top-edge and balloons up high behind the stumps for Dhoni to keep an eye on it and pouch a simple take
another lifter that squares Kemp up as he defends to the off side

tiiiiiiiiiimber! Kemp's woeful run at the international level continues, as like against Asif at Bangalore he junges forward and drives lustily, only to completely misread the line and his off stump is pegged back
just back of a length and Dippenaar rocks back and drives that with excellent placement through the covers
straighter ball this time, he drives down the ground and the misfield from Jayawardene allows the second
slower one outside off stump, pitches and deviates as he reaches across and chases it
fuller outside off stump, he reaches across for another drive and this time can only hit it into the ground for Asif to field himself
back of a length on the stumps, he gets back and on-drives down the ground for mid-on to field
back of a length on off stump, he shuffles and flicks to midwicket
short and wide, he mistimes the cut shot to point
drifts down leg stump and Dippenaar doesnt disappoint, flicking in the air down to fine leg for four
fuller on off stump, moves in as he drives and gets an inside-edge to square leg
back of a length on leg stump, Boucher taps that wide of Sehwag at midwicket and steals one
good lifter off the track, Fernando grunting as he bends his back, and Dippenaar is caught hopping up to keep it down
and again, this one fairly kicks off the surface and Dippenaar does well to jump up and keep it down in front of point, lively over from Fernando
tossed up on middle and leg, driven to cover
short and skidding down leg stump, Dippenaar brings up the 100 with a firm pull over midwicket for four
tossed up on the stumps, he makes room and drives to long-off for one
comes out, Rafique fires it full and flat but Boucher's flick has enough to get it out past mid-on and Mortaza dives well out in the deep to stop the four
tossed up on a length, and its driven to cover
too much on leg stump, making it easy for him to pick it up and flick behind square leg for four inside the Powerplay
good length on off stump and its flicked into midwicket where Jayawardene fields
shorter on off stump, he gets up, shuffles across, and turns it to midwicket
short of a length outside off stump and Boucher gets across to push it to cover
bouncer outside off stump and he chases it, but theres so much pace on that he cant get to it and Dhoni has work to do behind the stumps
another ripping bouncer that beats the batsman and Dhoni does well to get a touch on it, wide is the call from the umpire
good length this time and he drives to cover
back of a length on off stump and he drives back to Fernando
lands outside leg stump and spins further, wide is the call
again outside leg stump and its swept to Yousuf at short fine leg
comes out, bowler fires it full and the ball balloons off Boucher's foot to the off side
quicker and flatter on middle and leg and Boucher drives back down the track
flat on leg stump and Boucher uses his feet to flick to midwicket
now he finds the gap at midwicket, waiting and getting onto the back foot to punch a quicker one away for four
flatter outside off stump and he cuts that straight to point
short of a length outside off stump, he stands up and pushes that to Yousuf at cover
short of a length and moving in, Dippenaar stands grounded and defends to the leg side this time
sweet stroke, Dippenaar getting to his 50 with an effortless straight drive back past bowler and stumps for four, excellent innings
good length on middle and off and he drives with an inside-edge onto the back leg
fuller, wider delivery outside off stump and Dippenaar reaches out and chops to Yuvraj at point
nice bouncer over leg stump as Fernando sees Dippenaar shuffle just that much, and the batsman ducks down as the ball sails over his left shoulder
comes out, the ball is full on leg stump and Boucher can only drive to the fielder
dropped! Boucher whips a full and flat delivery on leg stump in the air to substitute Harbhajan at midwicket, who dives and gets a hand to it but lets it slip from his grasp
flat on leg stump and he works it to mid-on
uses the feet well and chips it over the infield down to long-off for one
full and flat and Dippenaar digs it out to the man at cover
flat outside off stump and he backs away to steer it to cover again
tossed up gently outside off stump, wide too, and its square-driven out to third man
tossed up again, Boucher comes forward and taps it into the covers
tossed up on middle and leg this time and Dippenaar drives back to the bowler
flatter on leg this time, he drives down the ground for one
flat outside off stump, Boucher stands and cuts past point
flatter on off stump, pushed wide of mid-off
flatter ball on leg stump, he makes room to leg and drives back down the track
tossed up more this time, but outside leg stump, and Boucher sweeps down to Fernando at fine leg to raise the 50-run stand
flat on leg stump and its flicked out to deep midwicket
makes room and drives a delivery on middle stump to cover
tossed up on off stump, he makes room again but ends up chopping into cover
tossed up on the stumps, Dippenaar makes room and drives nicely down the ground this time
tossed up full outside off stump and he drives to short cover
flatter delivery on off stump, he drives this one to Fernando at deep mid-off
outside leg stump, he does a Dhoni lap-sweep to Rafique at short fine leg
arm ball on off stump, driven to cover
tossed up ever so slighly and he stands to drive to deep mid-off
tossed up on off stump and he uses the feet to drive out to mid-off again
tossed up, he drives through cover and point for a well-run two
tossed up on middle and leg, spins in as Boucher drives down the ground
spins down leg stump, Boucher nudges it towards square leg
tossed up on middle and off, he backs away and drives to cover
fraction of width on offer and he forces it in front of point for one
spins into him this time but he adjusts to steer it to backward point
short and wide, cut out to backward point
tossed up, he drives down to long-off
tossed up, he comes out and slams that over mid-on down to long-on where Sehwag over-runs it and allows four
flatter this time, he uses the feet and drives to mid-off
flat down leg stump and he paddles it to short fine leg
flatter and a little bit shorter, allowing him the chance to hit it back over Yuvraj's head
slow delivery to begin, and Dippenaar drives down to long-on
he drives across the stumps and works it to midwicket for one more
good length outside off stump, driven to Yousuf at cover
back of a length on middle and leg, he uses the feet and picks up one to Rafique at mid-off on the circle
fraction wide and he late cuts down to third man for one more
fuller on leg stump and he on-drives past mid-on, who's late to get there, out to the man in the deep, Ganguly stares on
tossed up, driven to the man at cover
flat down leg stump, Dippenaar shuffles and works it to square leg
flat outside leg stump but Boucher cant time his lap-sweep
quicker one well outside leg stump and Boucher again makes a mess of his shot
tossed up on off stump, this time he drives down to long-off
gone! He gets into position to pull a fractionally short ball on leg stump, hitting with the wind and with little power and Harbhajan, running around from deep midwicket, judges it to perfection
good length delivery outside off stump and Pollock gets onto the front foot and drives it back to Ganguly
back of a length on off stump and he tries to turn it to leg but is taken by the pace
straighter delivery which he whips past square leg for one
flicks one from off stump down to fine leg
good length outside off stump, driven to extra cover
good length on the stumps, worked to square leg
tossed up outside off stump, he cuts to backward point
tossed up on off stump, he pushes to mid-off
flatter outside off stump, he cuts into the covers
tossed up on off stump, pushed into the covers
short and wide again, he gets back and puts that away behind point, good shot
tossed up, he comes onto the front foot and drives to extra cover
dragged in short on the stumps, and he pulls through midwicket out to where Asif tries to show off his footie skills but helps the ball over the ropes
good length on off stump and he drives back to Ganguly who cant get a foot to it
good length on off stump, flicked across the stumps for another single
slower ball, rolling the fingers over it, Boucher stands and drives to the man at mid-on
back of a length outside off stump, driven to cover
slower one angled down leg stump but Boucher does well to work it off the hips for one more
flat on off stump and Boucher pushes it back to Yuvraj
flatter on leg stump, he pulls down to fine leg for a couple
spins in from the rough and he steers it wide of point for the single to raise his 24th ODI fifty, gutsy innings
tossed up, spins in and squirts past leg stump off the inside-edge
tossed up, he reaches out and drives to Rafique at extra cover
tossed up, Boucher heaves across the line and it rolls to short fine leg
flat on leg stump, Pollock works it past square leg out to Fernando on the ropes
tossed up on off stump, he works it across the pads to midwicket
comes out and drives to mid-on
flat on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, worked off the pads to square leg
tossed up on off stump, flicked to midwicket
tossed up on leg stump, worked off  the pads to short fine leg
tossed up on leg stump, he looks to work it fine but misses out
short and flat and he hammers that through midwicket after picking the length
flat delivery outside off stump, gets back and drives to mid-off
tossed up down leg stump, he gets down and paddles it fine
tossed up on off stump and he drives back to Yuvraj
back of a length on middle stump, worked to midwicket
flat on middle stump, flicked to midwicket this time
flat on off stump, he shuffles and flicks past square leg
tossed up outside off stump, driven into the covers where Harbhajan does the fielding
tossed up down leg stump, he sweeps, misses, and Sehwag begs for that wicket
flat on leg stump, Boucher dances down, collects it on the full and drives to long-on for four, lovely pick up shot
tossed up on middle and off, worked to midwicket
flat on middle and leg, he comes out and flicks well
flat on middle and leg, he makes room to cut and just gets bat on it
flat on leg stump, he goes back and works that to square leg
tossed up outside off stump, he frees the arms and drives to cover
slower one on middle and off, he uses the soft hands and dabs it to point
flat on middle and leg, flicked out to Fernando in the deep
shot sir! First six of the innings comes courtesy Boucher, who adventures out of his crease and hammers one over mid-on
and there's the second, as he comes out again and creams Sehwag over wide long-on this time, lovely use of the feet, and a bigger six, wow!
flatter on middle and leg and he calmly works that to mid-on for one
flat down leg stump, pushed to square leg
flat down leg stump, another easy single to square leg
and he begins with a slow yorker on leg stump that Boucher digs out to midwicket

all over for him! Fernando doesnt waste time in this spell, following up the lovely yorker with a length delivery on middle and leg, which Boucher gets under and hits high in the air and down Asif's throat at long-on
full outside off stump and he gets off the mark with a drive into the covers
back of a length outside off stump, he pushes that to point
bouncer over leg stump, he takes his eyes off it as he pulls and that nearly knocked him over at 141ks
and the successful over comes to an end with a yorker that Pollock digs out back to mid-off
flat outside off stump, hurries into him as he tries to cut
flatter one outside off stump, Pollock stands and drives to cover
flat and 93ks on off stump, defended back to him
tossed up outside off stump, driven to cover
short and flat, he rocks back and cuts past point for a couple
tossed up on off stump, Pollock just drives back to Rafique
short and wide, cut hard to Yuvraj at backward point, good stop
yorker outside off stump, steered to backward point again
full and wide, square-driven to Yuvraj who misfields
full length delivery on middle and leg which Pollock turns to midwicket for one
short of a length outside off stump and again Morkel finds Yuvraj at backward point
back of a length coming into the left-hander, who defends back to Fernando
tossed up outside off stump, he looks to paddle but mistimes the attempt
flat on off stump, uses the feet and drives out to Harbhajan at long-on for one
goes over the wicket to the left-hander and beats him with a faster, straighter one outside off stump

full down leg stump, worked to Yousuf at short fine leg, Rafique doesnt realize theres a runner on and enthusiastically calls for the throw at his end and whips off the bail as he sees two men at the other side...funny scenes
too short, too quick and Pollock backs away to hammer it over mid-on, top shot
tossed up, and this time Pollock goes off side, driving in the gap at cover for four more
flat on off stump, worked to Rafique at mid-on
and he goes, miscuing an attempted lofted drive for six up in the air for Asif to hold another easy take down at long-on and Sehwag gets his man!
tossed up outside off stump and he lunges forward to drive through cover for two
flat on leg stump, Chigumbura shuffles and taps it to Yousuf at short fine leg and even his direct hit cant get a lightning-fast Sibanda as runner
short and flat on leg stump, worked to the man at short midwicket
again he goes onto leg stump and Morkel taps this in the gap at midwicket
tossed up, he comes forward and defends to off side
short outside off stump and Morkel pulls through square leg and beats Ganguly out on the ropes
flat on leg stump, Morkel comes down and flicks this to mid-on for one
flat outside leg stump, where he likes 'em, and sweeps at that in the air over square leg for four

what a catch! Chigumbura gets down on one knee and slams this high and down to long-on, the ball is in the air for some time and comes down to where Harbhajan lines it up perfectly on the ropes, jumps and takes it inches inside the boundary, immense effort and doesnt Harbhajan love it?
full and flat on off stump, worked out to Yousuf at deep midwicket
flat outside off stump, carved off the back foot out to Asif at deep cover
tossed up on off stump, he flicks across the front pad out to Yuvraj at deep midwicket
comes out, Sehwag sees him and fires it in
flat on middle and off, flicked into the deep midwicket region
full and flat on leg stump and he drives out to long-on
flat on the stumps, he comes out and drives wide of mid-on
flat on leg stump, pulled through midwicket for two
comes out, makes room and hammers this handsomely over long-off for maximum, does Botha
tossed up on leg stump, he gets down and reverse-sweeps for one
flat going down leg stump, he stands and flicks to midwicket
good catch from Ganguly! Morkel comes out, Rafique fires it in flat on leg stump, and the aerial flick off the pads is held inches off the ground by a diving Ganguly at mid-on
tossed up on middle and leg and Odoyo drives back towards Rafique's left
and he cleans up Botha first ball as he heaves across the line and loses his off stump
yorker outside off stump, he squeezes the bat onto it and watches the inside-edge shoot past leg stump
full outside off stump, he drives it to mid-off
low full toss outsude off stump which he cant get to
overpitched outside off stump and Morne drives out to Asif moving around from long-off
yorker-length delivery outside off stump which he drives to cover
he oversteps, and Odoyo makes no mistake with the low full toss, hitting it back over Asif's head for six, top shot!
slower ball goes awry, ending up low and wide outside off stump and beats Odoyo
drags one short this time and Odoyo pulls into the ground in front of short fine leg, sets off and a good throw from Rafique isnt collected well at all from Asif, else Odoyo was a goner
full on leg stump, fine leg is up so Morkel has no hassles flicking it away for four
full in the blockhole on leg stump and he drives it out to long-on
slower delivery beats Odoyo's wild slog, and wasnt very far from taking out leg stump
he makes room to leg, Asif follows him with a bouncer and he gets cramped foor room as he wafts at it, good bowling
full outside off stump, slower ball that Morne drives out to Harbhajan at long-off
full outside leg stump, Odoyo backs away and looks to flick and the ball beats him
slower one outside off stump, Odoyo heaves across the line and somehow the ball misses off stump
bounces him outside off stump and Odoyo again reaches out and heaves, only to miss out once more
low full toss on leg stump, which he punches down to long-on for one
fullish outside off stump, Morne gets down and drives it out to long-off
lands on a length and shapes away from him as he swings across the line
drifts to leg stump and Morkel works it to deep square leg
back of a length outside off stump and he steers it out past gully
dragged in short outside off stump and Morne pulls past Rafique at mid-on for four
low full toss outside leg stump which he clips out to deep backward square leg and Yuvraj does well to cut it off inside the ropes
short of a length on leg stump and he hammers it away through midwicket for one
slower one, moving away from outside off stump and Morne gives it everything only to miss it all
back of a length outside off stump, Morne drives down to Sehwag at long-on
overpitched outside off stump and Odoyo drives nicely through the covers for one
quicker delivery on leg stump squares him up and runs away past Dhoni to third man, the signal is leg-byes and replays show it did clip the top of the pad
marginally overpitched outside off stump and he uses the feet to drive this on the up for four to long-off
and he ends his spell with a bouncer over leg stump which Morkel cant put away with his attempted pull shot
bounces one down leg stump and wide is the call as Odoyo leaves it be
back of a length on off stump and he pushes it back down the track
full on leg stump, driven to Yousuf at mid-off
dragged in short outside off stump and Morkel moves to 25 with a firm pull over midwicket, couple of bounces and over the ropes
full toss on leg stump which he clips to midwicket
sends his off stump for a walk as Morne eyes up midwicket and swings across the line, and the Asians have won this game by 31 runs and have the series in the bag
